title: Michael Howard – 2022 Comments Calling for Resignation of Boris Johnson
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Michael Howard, the former leader of the Conservative Party, on BBC’s World at One programme on 24 June 2022.
content:
The party and more importantly the country would be better off under new leadership. Members of the cabinet should very carefully consider their positions.
